data.prayer: the state of Îles Loyauté has (about) 1,076 people who know Jesus, 12,574 people who know about him culturally, and 3,751 people who are far from Jesus.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Îles Loyauté, New Caledonia
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, set on fire the hearts and passion of your church in the state of Îles Loyauté.
data.verse: Do not be slothful in zeal, be fervent in spirit, serve the Lord.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 16 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, for those in trouble in the state of Îles Loyauté prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 1,076 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Tadine
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Tadine, Îles Loyauté, New Caledonia.
Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Îles Loyauté, New Caledonia.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.prayer: Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the state of Îles Loyauté, New Caledonia.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Îles Loyauté, New Caledonia to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.
